# AI Contributors

This project was developed with significant assistance from AI tools.

## Claude (Anthropic)

**Role**: Primary development assistant

**Contributions**:
- Architecture design and implementation
- Feature development (configuration system, multi-source support, favorites management)
- Code optimization and refactoring
- Documentation writing
- Bug fixing and debugging

**Collaboration Method**: Pair programming through Windsurf IDE

---

*Note: This file documents AI assistance in the development process. While AI tools provided significant help with code generation and problem-solving, all design decisions and final implementations were reviewed and approved by human developers.*
